TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataRowExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataRowExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义 类的扩展方法。

span.span: Defines the extension methods to the class.

summary.span: 这是一个静态类。

span.span: This is a static class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已通过 类 和 两个新方法扩展了 API。The API has been extended with two new methods of the class, and . 您可以使用它们来构建对 对象的 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 表达式和方法查询。You can use these to form [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries against objects. 它们是用于访问 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 表达式和方法查询中的列值的建议方法。They are the recommended methods to use for accessing column values within [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries. 有关详细信息，请参阅[泛型字段和 SetField 方法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Generic Field and SetField Methods](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md).

summary.span: 提供对 中的每个列值的强类型访问。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the .

.method public static hidebysig !!T Field<T>(class System.Data.DataRow row, class System.Data.DataColumn column) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Field(Of T) (row As DataRow, column As DataColumn) As T
static member Field : System.Data.DataRow * System.Data.DataColumn -> 'T

typeparam.span: 指定列的返回类型的泛型形参。

span.span: A generic parameter that specifies the return type of the column.

param.span: 输入的 ，充当扩展方法的 实例。

span.span: The input , which acts as the instance for the extension method.

param.name: column
param.span: 输入 对象，该对象指定要返回其值的列。

span.span: The input object that specifies the column to return the value of.

summary.span: 为指定行中的每个列值提供强类型访问。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the specified row.

summary.span: 方法还支持可以为 null 的类型。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

returns.span: 由 指定的 类型的 值。

span.span: The value, of type , of the specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用 类的 实例表示**null**值。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. 访问包含**null**值的列的 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 表达式会在运行时生成 。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外， 不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, does not support nullable types. 方法支持将列作为可为 null 的类型进行访问。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果 中的基础值 ，则返回的可以为 null 的类型的值将为**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定 的值 并且 `T` 是引用类型或可以为 null 的类型，则返回类型将为**null**。If the value of the specified is and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回 。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要类型转换，您应该首先使用 方法获取列值。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，应将列值转换为另一种类型。The column value should then be converted to another type.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

exception.span: 指定的列不会出现在包含 的 中。

span.span: The column specified by does not occur in the that the is a part of.

exception.span: 将“null”值赋给了不可为 null 的类型。

span.span: A **null** value was assigned to a non-nullable type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用 类的 实例表示**null**值。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. 访问包含**null**值的列的 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 表达式会在运行时生成 。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外， 不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, doesn't support nullable types. 方法支持将列作为可为 null 的类型进行访问。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果 中的基础值 ，则返回的可以为 null 的类型的值将为**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定 的值为**null** ，并且 `T` 为引用类型或可以为 null 的类型，则返回类型将为**null**。If the value of the specified is **null** and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, then the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回 。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要类型转换，您应该首先使用 方法获取列值。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，应将列值转换为另一种类型。The column value should then be converted to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 为**null**，则 方法会将**null**值转换为基础 中的 。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 类型转换可以由 对象执行，转换后的值随后将保存到该行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以通过基础 对象中的 方法向上传递异常。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 找不到由 指定的列。

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: 为“null”。

span.span: The is **null**.

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 为**null**，则 方法会将**null**值转换为基础 中的 。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 类型转换可以由 对象执行，转换后的值随后将保存到该行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以通过基础 对象中的 方法向上传递异常。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could be not cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

param.name: value

summary.span: 为 中的指定列设置一个新值。

span.span: Sets a new value for the specified column in the .

summary.span: 方法还支持可以为 null 的类型。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 为**null**，则 方法会将**null**值转换为基础 中的 。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 类型转换可以由 对象执行，转换后的值随后将保存到该行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以通过基础 对象中的 方法向上传递异常。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 找不到由 指定的列。

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: 尝试对已删除的行设置值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .
